basics.name: Xiao Meng

work.name: Dine
work.summary:
- Worked with design and development teams to make custom software solutions, and completed a total of three projects.
- Deployed and delivered the website to CDN and dedicated servers.
- Troubleshot and resolved any issues that arose from the customers.
- Set up and maintained the tools and processes used for CI/CD pipelines involving GitLab and Git Flow.

work.name: Yuansuan, Inc.
work.summary:
- Managed a team of 10 software developers, overseeing their work and providing guidance and support.
- Designed system architecture for a SaaS platform, ensuring technical feasibility and scalability.
- Collaborated with interdisciplinary teams, including product managers, designers, and QA engineers, to deliver high-quality software products on time and within budget.
- Provided technical support on-call, troubleshooting and resolving software issues from the end-users.

work.name: Sixteen Markets, Inc.
work.summary:
- **Team Management**: Expanded developer team from 6 to 18 people in 3 years, with roles in front-end, back-end, testing, and operation. Led team and coordinated schedules/tasks, hosted daily/periodic meetings, and set team rules/regulations.
- **System Architecture**: Designed service-level protocol with Protobuf/gRPC for inter-service communication. Designed external API specification with JSON Schema and OpenAPI.
- **Software Development**: Implemented access layer gateway with OpenResty/Lua for bidirectional conversion between internal Protobuf/gRPC and external HTTP API. Developed/maintained accounting/clearing systems, internal admin systems, and other microservices using Python and Go. Developed tools for data structure definition, API code generation, and documentation generation.
- **Development Process Management**: Developed GitFlow-based Git workflow and set up Atlassian applications for project management, version control, and CI/CD. Designed/developed Python packaging format and Ansible-based automated release solution.

work.name: Wandou Labs
work.summary:
- Monitored and analyzed system performance to identify potential issues or areas for improvement.
- Participated in on-call rotations to respond to alerts and system failures and support other teams.
- Developed automated solutions and internal tools, improving the reliability, scalability, and maintainability of systems and services.
- Collaborated with developer teams to optimize the design and implementation of new/existing systems and services.

work.name: Sohu.com
work.summary:
- Developed and maintained back-end services and APIs for a variety of applications and platforms using languages such as Python and PHP.
- Explored best practices for building API services using various databases such as MySQL, MongoDB, and Apache Cassandra.
- Collaborated with front-end developers to integrate UI features with the back-end APIs.

projects.name: Yuansuan Cloud for Business
projects.description: A hybrid cloud platform for computer-aided engineering in HPC clusters.
highlights: Collected and analyzed customer requirements, designed the on-premises system, managed the developer team, and delivered the product in a limited time.

projects.name: G7.com.cn
highlights: Rebuilt front-end and back-end of the website with the latest technology and systematic modules.

projects.name: Cashier
projects.description: A clearing system for the online stock trading brokerage service.
highlights: Designed and implemented the whole system from the ground up. The challenge was to learn trading/clearing rules from scratch and create an API platform for introducing brokers, which is the first of its kind in the industry.

projects.name: Backbone API Docs
projects.description: An API documentation platform like readme.com.
highlights: Developed the front-end, back-end, and toolchains for the product. Wrote customer-oriented documents, including API references, JSON Schema definitions, and Markdown user guides.

projects.name: Loki
projects.description: A deployment automation system for large-scale applications on thousands of servers.
highlights: Designed and implemented the front-end of the system, collaborating with teammates to deliver the scheduling and data collection modules.
